name: Financial Engineering
description: This course will focus on capital budgeting, financial optimization, and project evaluation models and their solution techniques. In particular, linear, non-linear, and integer programming models and their solutions techniques will be studied. The course will give engineering students a background in modern capital budgeting and financial techniques that are relevant in practival engineering and commercial settings.
prerequisites: MAT186H1, MAT187H1, MAT188H1, MIE236H1, MIE237H1, or equivalent.
